title: Auth: Prisma + PostgreSQL
description: Implement sign-up/sign-in with Prisma + Postgres, JWT sessions, validation, and Next.js API adapters for LoveConnect.

title: Auth server logic (hash, JWT, repository)
description: Implement auth services/controllers/repositories for sign-up/sign-in, password hashing/verify, token issuance, rememberMe expiry.

title: API routes /auth/sign-up + /auth/sign-in
description: Add Next.js App Router handlers as thin adapters to entities/auth routes/controllers.

title: Matches metrics: support new matches/active chats when API exposes data
description: Investigate API support for match timestamps/status or chat activity; update matches stats when fields/endpoints are available.

title: Dashboard page via JetSetRDV proxy
description:
Context:
- Build /dashboard page using JetSetRDV API via Next.js proxy per tasks/02-dashboard-page-impl.md; data must flow Client -> /api/dashboard/* -> JetSetRDV.

Plan:
1) Swagger recon: confirm upstream endpoints for community activity (/index_api/wall vs /ajax_api/getActivities), top members (/index_api/topmembers), and recent visitors (/index_api/guest/get/visites); record HTTP method (POST for topmembers/visites, GET for getActivities), required query params (api_key, sex, age_range, page, session_id/wall_date) and response shapes (ResultTopMembers/MembreBlock, ResultGuestVisites, ResultWall/MembreWall).
2) Shared fetch util: add src/shared/api/jetsetrdv/fetch-jetsetrdv.ts to compose API_URL + path, append api_key, attach Accept/json + auth header as needed, support next/cache, and normalize non-2xx errors to a typed shape while preventing arbitrary URL injection.
3) Dashboard entity API + types: create src/entities/dashboard/model/dashboard.types.ts for CommunityActivityItem, TopMember, RecentVisitor and typed response envelopes; add server-side functions calling JetSetRDV via the shared util and mapping fields (gender mapping 1=men,2=women) into UI-friendly shapes with graceful fallbacks.
4) Next.js proxy routes: expose entities/dashboard/api/routes for activity, top-members, and recent-visitors; add thin adapters in src/app/api/dashboard/*/route.ts forwarding safe query params (gender/page) and default age range; ensure no API key leakage.
5) Dashboard view/widgets: build views/dashboard-page composed of widgets for start matching CTA, community activity feed, top members tabs, and recent visitors; fetch data via proxy endpoints using a consistent approach (e.g., client fetch/SWR or server fetch + Suspense); cover loading skeletons, empty states, and non-blocking error UI.
6) QA: wire index exports, basic error handling, and add light tests/validation for the fetch util or data mappers; verify UI renders within existing dashboard layout.

Open questions:
- JetSet endpoints expect session_id (visites required, wall required) and topmembers needs age_range; do we have a JetSet session_id per logged-in user and what default age range should we use (e.g., 18-99)? Also, confirm whether to prefer /index_api/wall (MembreWall list with date_action) over /ajax_api/getActivities (block-style payload) for the activity feed.

comments.author: romansmolin
comments.text: Clarifications from user: JetSetRDV session_id must be obtained via proxy login (stop using local-only auth). Top members default age_range = 18-50. Activity feed should use list-oriented endpoint (/index_api/wall).

title: Auth DTOs + validation (Zod)
description: Define sign-up/sign-in DTOs with Zod, shared error shapes, and input normalization rules.

title: Auth: implement forgot/reset password via Fotochat endpoints
description: Add BFF routes for /index_api/lostpass and /index_api/changepass, wire UI forms to real API calls, and surface user-facing success/error states.

title: Auth tests + exports
description: Add minimal tests/verification and ensure public index exports for new auth entity modules.

title: Prisma setup + User schema
description: Add Prisma ORM setup, define User model + LookingFor enum, update env usage, and plan migration.

title: Client auth flow updates
description: Update auth forms/API client to use /auth/sign-up & /auth/sign-in, support rememberMe, and redirect to /dashboard on success.

title: Subscription & contact: replace placeholder APIs with real BFF routes
description: Implement Next.js API routes for subscription update/cancel and contact-us email, and replace placeholder STRIPE_LINKS with configured values.
